items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: I'm 5'0 and it was knee length on me so fit more like a sweater dress. Perfect with or without leggings or stockings Read more
items.author: Kia

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering
items.body: The cut is flattering. The material is nice and thick (perhaps a bit itchy). It’s generously sized - if you’re somewhat between sizes, I’d try to order down, unless you want a more modest cut. Read more
items.author: Luke Hallam

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress is beautiful
items.body: Very Nice Dress that is soft and stylish. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater dress can be styled to fit any occasion. Very comfortable.
items.body: This is a very comfortable and stylish dress! The fabric is soft and warm, not at all itchy like some sweater dresses I've worn. It's perfect to wear while out and about with leggings and boots or just worn around the house as a comfortable pajama dress. The collar around the neck isn't too tight or restrictive and the hem falls far enough down that you could wear this sans leggings. The print is very cute and I'm very happy to add this to my winter wardrobe. I have a hard time finding sweater dresses that are flattering and comfortable and this dress certainly is. I'm 5'8, 170 lbs. and ordered an XL, which fits perfectly. I have a long torso and struggle finding short dresses that aren't just long shirts on me, and most I have to wear legging under because the just aren't long enough to cover my bum. This dress I can actually wear as a dress, and while it is short it still covers everything. I'm very happy with this dress, indeed. Read more
items.author: Reviewer 24601

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Cute, and Perfectly Festive
items.body: This sweater dress is such a fun holiday piece! It strikes the perfect balance between festive and flattering—definitely more “cute Christmas” than “ugly sweater.” The knit is super soft and surprisingly warm without feeling too bulky, and the length hits right at the knee on me (I’m 5'5"), making it great for wearing with tights or leggings. The apricot color is soft and wintery, and the snowflake and reindeer design gives just enough holiday cheer without being over the top. I wore it to a Christmas party and got so many compliments—it’s cozy enough to lounge in but cute enough for photos and events. It also washes well, which is always a bonus! Great little holiday find. Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prettiest "ugly sweater" I've ever seen
items.body: This "ugly sweater dress" is so pretty! The material is soft and thick to keep you warm and cozy, excellent quality! Length is perfect for me. I'm 5' 3.5" tall, 140 lbs and it comes just above the top of my knee. Very figure flattering. I probably could have gone down 1 size but I'm very happy with this item. It's one of my new favorite winter wardrobe items! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater dress. Thick and warm
items.body: Cute sweater dress. The colors are bright and the patterns is festive. Its actually really thick and fairly warm. The fit is curve hugging. I am 5'4,147lbs i usually wear a medium and the medium fit perfectly. I have jeans on under in the picture which makes it a little bulky looking. Read more
items.author: LeighAnn Morris

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: D-black-01, D-green-01, D-black-02, D-green-02, D-black-03, D-red-05, D-red-03, D-red-04, Apricot, D-red-02, Light Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
